## Goals [![](http://static.squarespace.com/static/5150aec6e4b0e340ec52710a/t/51525c33e4b0b3e0d10f77ab/1364352052403/Data_Science_VD.png?format=750w)](http://drewconway.com/zia/2013/3/26/the-data-science-venn-diagram) 
<section>

Goals

  • Practical data visualization
  • working with actual data
  • collaborating with others
  • using modern, rapidly changing tools

Rapidly Changing:

  • NPR Viz Data processing workflow, published on Tuesday
  • RMarkdown Released Tuesday
  • Beaker Notebook release May
  • vega latest release July
  • dplyr constant development
  • D3 last point release in December
  • Upshot New features weekly?

Some things are… timeless?

  • Guidance from 1915

Master the everyday, mundane but indispensible…

…tools of the trade:

  • text editors
  • version control (git)
  • the command line

  • Practice iterative and collaborative development of your projects
  • Initiate and participate in code and project reviews
  • Fail early, learn from it, and ask for help

Project manager

  • help with presentation structure
  • help project organization
  • divide tasks
  • the simplest thing that could possibly work
